channel.title: Ok i got 1 questiong and need a little bit of help
channel.description: ok well im trying to add some stuff to my shops but in my files i cant seem to find my "shops.java" or what ever that is where my shops r and their items where would i find it at? plz help

item.title: Ok i got 1 questiong and need a little bit of help
item.dc:creator: @Runescape_Project Runescape Project
item.description:
@Runescape_Project wrote:

right click it then select properties then where it says opens with and change make it to notepad.

Read full topic
